headline: Is Federal Realty (FRT) Offering A Compelling Entry Point After Recent Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Federal Realty Investment Trust is fairly priced or offering value at its current level, this article will walk through what the numbers are actually saying about the stock. The share price recently closed at US$109.13, with returns of 4.1% over the last 7 days, 7.2% over 30 days, 10.2% year to date, 8.1% over 1 year, 16.5% over 3 years and 29.2% over 5 years, which gives useful context before looking at valuation. Recent attention on Federal Realty Investment...
